mapper.select: select id, member_id, sku_id, session_id, subcribe_time, send_time, notice_type from sms_seckill_sku_notice where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into sms_seckill_sku_notice(member_id, sku_id, session_id, subcribe_time, send_time, notice_type) values (#{memberId}, #{skuId}, #{sessionId}, #{subcribeTime}, #{sendTime}, #{noticeType})

insert into sms_seckill_sku_notice(member_id, sku_id, session_id, subcribe_time, send_time, notice_type) values
(#{entity.memberId}, #{entity.skuId}, #{entity.sessionId}, #{entity.subcribeTime}, #{entity.sendTime}, #{entity.noticeType})

insert into sms_seckill_sku_notice(member_id, sku_id, session_id, subcribe_time, send_time, notice_type) values
(#{entity.memberId}, #{entity.skuId}, #{entity.sessionId}, #{entity.subcribeTime}, #{entity.sendTime}, #{entity.noticeType})
on duplicate key update member_id = values(member_id), sku_id = values(sku_id), session_id = values(session_id), subcribe_time = values(subcribe_time), send_time = values(send_time), notice_type = values(notice_type)
mapper.update:
update sms_seckill_sku_notice
member_id = #{memberId},
sku_id = #{skuId},
session_id = #{sessionId},
subcribe_time = #{subcribeTime},
send_time = #{sendTime},
notice_type = #{noticeType},
where id = #{id}
